962.question: Do they build one model per topic or on all topics?

9-Table1-1.png: The image and caption do not provide enough information to answer the question.
20-Figure2-1.png: The bar chart shows the distribution of human preference scores for different topics. It appears that they build one model per topic, as there are separate bars for each topic with distinct colors representing different aspects of the models.

963.question: Do they quantitavely or qualitatively evalute the output of their low-rank approximation to verify the grouping of lexical items?

10-Table2-1.png: The text does not provide enough information to answer the question.
15-Table7-1.png: They quantitatively evaluate the output of their low-rank approximation by using a two-tailed paired t-test to determine if the matrix completion helps capture similar concepts.
